about_the_game:
Your adventure starts now!

Experience a grand and heartfelt adventure through relaxing gameplay and controls.
Jump, Dash, and Swing your way up the great spire of wishes where you will get your innermost wish fulfilled.

Everyone dreams - everyone needs a helping hand

You are not alone on your way to the top. Other climbers also want to see their wishes realized. Meet this cast of quirky characters, help them and let them help you as you make friends and memories.

A tiny world with lots to do

Collectibles and treasures are hidden all over the tiny island. Some require you to solve puzzles and riddles whereas others test your platforming abilities. As a reward, you can trade your riches for hats and outfits.

For new and seasoned gamers alike

Spirebound is designed with young and inexperienced players in mind. The fixed camera views of the game allow young and inexperienced players to simply pick the game up and have fun. The whole adventure can be played and finished this way.
For more experienced players, we created 'Dream Dares', entirely optional bonus levels, wherein you can put your platforming skills to the test.

Minimum:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: Ascend the great spire of wishes. Embark on adventures, make friends, and overcome your fears as you make your way to the top in this casual adventure platformer.
